pageProduct.name: Voost Iron Plus Effervescent 10 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

VOOST Iron + Vitamin C Helps Prevent Dietary Iron Deficiency

VÖOST the great tasting vitamin BOOST

We're passionate about all things effervescent and we're on a mission to make vitamin supplements a bit more appealing! We're armed with the world's largest range of effervescent vitamins and minerals to help you find just the right one to suit your needs.

Simple to use. Premium formulation. Great tasting.

Effervescent Vitamins and Minerals

Size: 10 Tablets

Flavour: Raspberry

Serving Size: 1 Tablet

Servings Per Pack: 10

KEY FEATURES

• VÖOST Iron + Vitamin C Helps Enhance Absorption of Dietary Iron
• VÖOST Iron + Vitamin C Helps Support Haemoglobin Formation
• VÖOST Iron + Vitamin C Helps Prevent Dietary Iron Deficiency
• VÖOST Iron + Vitamin C Helps Support Red Blood Cell Health
• VÖOST Iron + Vitamin C Helps Support General Health and Wellbeing

Warnings

ALWAYS READ THE LABEL. FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS FOR USE.
Not for the treatment of Iron deficiency. Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Adults only. Keep out of reach of children. Store tube tightly closed in cool, dry place. Store below 25°C. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing. Contains Saccharin Sodium.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Not for the treatment of iron deficiency. Vitamin supplement should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Adults only.
Do not use if cap seal is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Iron (as Ferrous Sulfate - Dried) 18 mg
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 90 mg
Folic Acid 400 microgram
Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12) 5.2 microgram
Each tablet contains 275 mg of sodium

Contains: Each tablet contains 275mg of Sodium. Contains Saccharin-Sodium.

Directions

Adults: Take 1 tablet daily, dissolved in 200 ml of water, or as directed by your health professional.

USAGE INSTRUCTIONS

How to use:
Adults: Take 1 tablet daily, dissolved in 200mL of water, or as directed by your healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store tube tightly closed in a cool, dry place. Store below 25°C. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
